query:
select
                node.id as "id!",
                kind as "kind!",
                cluster,
                (case when
                    controller.last_heartbeat > now() - interval '30 seconds'
                    then controller.id
                    else null end
                ) as controller,
                name as "name!",
                node.plane_version as "plane_version!",
                node.plane_hash as "plane_hash!"
            from node
            left join controller on controller.id = node.controller
